strings.page_1: Soma amabwiriza yo gukoresha STANDARD Q COVID-19 Ag neza, kandi witonze
strings.page_2: Reba itariki kizarangiriraho ahajya inyuma. Ntukoreshe iki gikoresho, niba itariki kizarangiriraho yarageze.
strings.page_3:
Umuhondo: Byemewe 
Icyatsi: Ntibyemewe 
 
Reba igikoresho cyo gupima hamwe n'ibindi bisabwa.
strings.page_4: Injiza agakoresho kabigenewe mu izuru ry'usuzumwa, ukube ahajya hejuru, Hanyuma usohore ako gakoresho mu izuru
strings.page_5: Shyira ako gakoresho mu kandi gakoresho kabigenewe. Ugenda ukanda kanda, koroga ukoresheje ako gakoreho inshuro zirenze eshanu
strings.page_6: Kuramo ka gakoresho, ugenda ukanda mu mpande zaho kari kari kugirango kumuke
strings.page_7:
Shyira ibitonyanga bitatu (3) ahabigenewe 

Reba ibisubizo by'iki kizamini mu minota 15 - 30.
